definition: To impart knowledge or skills to someone through instruction or education, typically in a formal setting such as a classroom or training session. This verb is commonly used when referring to the act of teaching academic subjects, practical skills, or theoretical concepts.

examples.german: Ich lehre Mathematik an der Universität.
examples.english: I teach mathematics at the university.

examples.german: Der Lehrer lehrt den Schülern die deutsche Grammatik.
examples.english: The teacher teaches the students German grammar.

examples.german: Er lehrt mich, wie man Gitarre spielt.
examples.english: He teaches me how to play the guitar.

examples.german: Die Erfahrung lehrt uns, geduldig zu sein.
examples.english: Experience teaches us to be patient.
